room_title: Escape room "Missing" by Masterpiece Escapes in Charlotte
room_address: 14015 E Independence Blvd Indian Trail, NC 28079
room_description:
30 years ago in the small town of Harpers Ferry, 10-year-old Malachi Taylor went missing. Over the next two months, another twelve people disappeared, never to be heard from again. For years, the townsfolk suspected the reclusive hermit Eugene Dutton might have something to do with it.
Now people have started going missing again. You are sent in to investigate the old hermit's house to see if you can find any clues. Just make sure you don't become the next one to go missing...
